SourceBinding: Source visualization we should capture, i.e. Scene Color, World Normal, etc
FrameSize: Size of each frame we generate.
AtlasTextureSize: Size of the atlas texture when generating an atlas.
TextureAddressX: After baking sets the texture address mode to use on the X axis.
TextureAddressY: After baking sets the texture address mode to use on the Y axis.
AtlasAssetPathFormat: When enabled a texture atlas is created
FramesAssetPathFormat: When enabled each frame will create an asset.
FramesExportPathFormat: When enabled each frame will be exported to the output path using the format extension.
